Body.Content:
Updated March 15, 2024; We have updated the rollout timeline below. Thank you for your patience.

We're excited to announce that the search bar at the top of the Microsoft Teams admin center (TAC) will now support resource accounts.

When this will happen:

Worldwide, GCC, and GCC High: We will begin rolling this out in early March 2024 and expect to complete by late March 2024 (previously early March).

How this will affect your organization:

The TAC search now supports a wide range of entities, including teams, users, policies, settings, documentation, emergency addresses, and resource accounts.



What you need to do to prepare:

No action is needed from you to prepare for this rollout. You may want to notify your Teams administrators about this new capability and update your training and documentation as appropriate.

Details.Name: Summary
Details.Value: The Microsoft Teams admin center search bar will now support resource accounts. The rollout will begin in early March 2024 and will affect a wide range of entities. No action is needed to prepare for this rollout.

Title: Microsoft Teams admin center (TAC): Search now supports resource accounts
